description: Remember the chocolate crackles of your childhood? Try this spin-off chocolate crackle slice recipe made with buttery macadamias and white chocolate.
name: Caramelised White Chocolate Crackle Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rice pops, nuts and sugar in a large bowl. Add chocolate mixture and stir to combine. Spoon mixture into pan. Using back of a metal spoon, press mixture to compact. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until set. Remove pan from fridge and stand for 10 minutes before cutting into pieces. Serve.
